choices: You are a human, skilled with tools, if weak and fragile.
You are a raptor, sharp of fang and quick on your feet.
You are a rex, large, mighty and king of the preditors.
You are a stegosaur, armoured... and angry.
1.content:
In the year 2214, on April the third, a human space ship landed on the fourth world of a remote binary solar system, about thirty-four light years away from Earth. The human explorers were surprised to find what appeared to be living, breathing dinosaurs already there, quite different to the slow lumbering monsters they were believed to be.

These dinosaurs seemed to have near-human intelligence after a few were captured and tested... and some even showed intellectual capacaty greater than humans.

Five years have passed, and it is April the second, 2219 by the Terran calander. Disgusted by the machines of the mammalians, the dinosaurs have agreed that the time to drive them out has come. Though still fighting amongst each other, several factions have risen... The fight for survival is on.

But what faction do you fight for?
1.title: Eve of the Hunt

choices: Male
Female
11.content:
A trained survivor, you know how to use the weapons you have against the angry dinosaurs an hybrids that wander this world, and you've got a lot of tricks up your sleaves.

Are you:
11.title: You're a human, outnumbered and outpowered.

choices: they chase you down and eat you
they chase you down and squish you
they chase you down and feed you to their hatchlings
111.content:
In a world at war with dinosaurs-in this case, raptors, there can be only one, and it looks like the raptors will win. the first continent to be conquered was Africa, the birthplace of men. The way they figured it, exterminating the source was a good way to start.

You're male. On a business trip to Africa, you grow terrified to see the raptors eating and squishing people under their claw pads. You turn around in a hurry and go to take the plane home, but the raptors don't intend to let walking meat go.
111.title: Male

choices: The old raptor talks, in your language.
The raptors all growl at you then eachother
Go ahead with the death then(Or reader's choice.)
1111.content:
(Can't have a story if the first chapter after picking your sex is death.)

You run as fast as you can... odd that you are unarmed out here but the war had been going on for a few years now. And it wasn't likely that the raptors were trying to eat you, but rather capture you... Not long after you hear one pounce before you are knocked on the ground by the raptor and it... as you don't know its sex warbles and growls in your ear, probably a language that the raptors have.

It wasn't long before the mouth did close over your head and started drawing you in... You panic thinking death is awaiting you. Perhaps it is, or not, either way you are whatever the raptor thinks you are as gulps follow you as you descend deeper into the beast before long only your legs wave in the air. And after another swallow you are a wiggling lump on the underside of a raptor. It takes off... and you can only feel the legs moving and it taking you somewhere...

You awaken as your surroundings flex and contract and before long you are coming out and falling down to the ground the raptor that took you is now looking at you and warbles and growls pointing at you like a human to a dog, meaning to stay as she watched you... she then left the place as you look around realizing that it is a hut... It has a house? You wonder before long the raptor returns with other raptors and an old one...
1111.title: they chase you down and capture you

choices: Sneaky and fast, you are a Velociraptor scout, always curious and on the move.
A front-line warrior and hunter, you are a powerful Utahraptor, eager to feast o
A mix of the natural and the unnatural sciences of humanity, you are a half-rapt
12.content:
Raptors come in several varietys, ranging from the wolf-sized Velociraptors to the giant five meter long Utahraptors.

Also, thanks to human tinkering, several raptor-human hybrids wander the planets surface as well.

The smartest and quickest of the dinosaurs, the raptors have the most to gain from getting rid of the humans, their three-fingered foreclaws nearly as agile as human fingers, and their minds as sharp as their claws, able to figure out the humans devices.

What role have you taken in your quest to rid the world of humans?
12.title: Hunter of the Pack

choices: Capture them both
Other?
123.content: Your name is unpronounceable in any human language and because of human tinkering on the genetic level; you have both the characteristics of a human and a raptor. You are a young male and you joined the raptor army to push the human scum off your world. You are attached to a raptor Special Forces unit and your primary mission is to infiltrate and obtain human technology for the raptors. Your secondary mission is to capture humans for interrogation, food, study, and dissection. As you sneak onto a human farm, you see a pond near by. You then see two young human girls skinny-dipping. As you watch them, you can feel you’re large human like penis throbbing. You decide to...
123.title: Raptor/human

choices: Wait a little longer and watch them more.
Knock them out quickly, and drag them somewhere private.
1232.content:
Smirking a little as you watch the two girls, you slowly lick your muzzle, thinking to yourself. There aren't many hybrids like yourself, and you've never actually been intimate with a human before. You feel your arrousal building as you watch them, reaching down to stroke your member, hiding down behind the bushes.
These two are both attractive enough for humans for them to be wasted back home, either food or test subjects. Heh, you can think of a few tests you'd like to run on them. You wonder if they'd squeal when mounted them...
1232.title: Observation...

choices: First choice?
Second choice?
Third choice?
Readers T-Rex choice one?
Readers T-Rex choice two?
13.content:
What kind of T-Rex are you?

First choice, the normal kind big, fast, and strong, but also surprisingly intelligent, well you did not get to be the king of the dinosaurs by being a dumb-ass!

Second choice, you are a human made mutation, and you want revenge on these hairless apes.

Third choice, you are another mutation, and you want revenge on these hairless apes.
13.title: T-Rex

choices: A two-story house with a human family inside?
A white human couple, male and female making love in the nude?
You choose?
132.content:
Your name in your own language is Voros, and in English, it literally means devourer! You are a human made mutation, and you want revenge on these hairless apes. You still have the size, strength, speed, and big mouth of normal T-Rex, but you also have much longer arms, and large human like hands, with retractable claws on your long fingers. You also have human like male genitalia, much greater intelligence than normal, the ability to talk to humans, and the ability to become temporarily invisible at will, something you intend to use against these humans. In addition, these stupid humans also gave you something else, huge pterodactyl like wings, and yes, you can easily fly even while invisible.

After you escaped the human lab, and quickly killed a few guards, you joined up with the Dinosaur National Army, and sense you are very well educated, you have been given the job of a field scientist. You job is to infiltrate human controlled territory, and collect healthily living human specimens for scientific study. You plan to humiliate all your captives, and maybe even swallow a few of them as well. You heard they taste great undressed, and all natural.

On this mission, your first, you have infiltrated a few hundred miles into human controlled territory at night, with the help of a dinosaur made stealth-flying ship. The humans are too arrogant to believe your species capable of such a feat, so there are no military patrols out here, only civilians. You are caring with you a large, glass cage capable of holding two dozen living humans inside. You are also caring a ray gun to defend yourself with, just in case. As you leave your parked stealth ship behind, you carefully, yet quickly move through the enemy’s lush territory, when you come across whom or what first?
132.title: You are a mutant T-Rex!

info.brief_description: On a world shared by humans and inteligent dinosaurs, who rules?
info.description:
In the future, sometime in the 23rd century, mankind has taken to the stars, exploring the galaxy, settling other worlds.

Over twenty solar systems are inhabited by humans now, and to the best of there knowledge, they have not encounted any sentient aliens yet. Or so the believe...

On one colony world, humans discovered dinosaurs similar to those that died out on Earth. There are no signs of civilastion, but several of the reptiles on this world are just as smart as the human invaders.

In the struggle between humans and dinosaurs, who will be victorious?
